Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people are chattering about the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) as the government gives the green light to all 51 recommendations for its overhaul. Treasurer Jim Chalmers is set to unveil the major reshaping of the bank including establishing an external committee to review its performance bringing more transparency and appointing new positions. This marks the most significant shake-up of the RBA in decades aimed at addressing the bank's lack of communication and accountability. Are people excited or sceptical? We shall see.
